Question
========

A person achieves a score of 12.6 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 14 with a standard deviation 4.7. The z-score of the person with 12.6 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.3
* 0.33
* 0.76

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.3: Correct
* 0.33: Incorrect
* 0.76: Incorrect
